title: Glottography dataset derived from Schapper 2020 "1. Introduction to The Papuan languages of Timor, Alor and Pantar. Volume 3"
description: This dataset provides non-overlapping, contemporary language ranges for Papuan languages on Alor-Pantar as depicted in Map 3 of Schapper 2020.
citation: Schapper, Antoinette. 2020. 1. Introduction to The Papuan languages of Timor, Alor and Pantar. Volume 3. In  Schapper, Antoinette (ed.) 1–52. Berlin, Boston: De Gruyter Mouton. doi: doi:10.1515/9781501511158-001.
